title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: Hi,Going on holiday next week and thinking of purchasing this book below.Wondering if anyone has read it and if it is worth a read?I only started investing 6 months ago and thought it would be a good read as it has over sold millions of copies but some of the latest reviews have not been great? https://www.amazon.co.uk/Rich-Dad-Poor-Teach-Middle/dp/1612681131/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=rich+dad+poor+dad+paperback&qid=1663156329&sprefix=rich+dad+poor+dad+paper%2Caps%2C59&sr=8-1

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: I never go against books that might interest you on specific areas in life but i will also like to recommend you with crypto books written by some renown authors that could help fix up some aspects you may require such as support in your crypto journey, 50 Movies, 100 Books and 100 podcasts on Bitcoin, and more if you're truly the type that have interest in reading then you will find alot of resourceful materials there that could give your experience some steps forward to success in cryptocurrency.
